description: PIMS 125 FP CC:  Wind Power Market Development Initiative

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: Promotion of the development of the wind energy market in Kazakhstan by assisting the Govrnemnt to formulate a ntional programme on wind energy developemnt; providing information for and building the local capacity to develop wind energy projects in Kazakhstan and to orginize financing for them; facilitating the construction of the first 5MW wind farm to prepare gground for and reduce the risks of further investments; and monitoring, analysing and dissemonating the experiences and lessons laerned during implmentation of the project.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Wind power market initiative
